SQL.LOAD: SELECT report_name, period_generated, last_pagenum, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, status, company_id, pagectrl_id FROM elp_reports_pagectrl WHERE pagectrl_id = :pagectrl_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_reports_pagectrl SET report_name = :report_name, period_generated = :period_generated, last_pagenum = :last_pagenum, status = :status, company_id = :company_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE pagectrl_id = :pagectrl_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_reports_pagectrl ( report_name, period_generated, last_pagenum, status, company_id, created_by, pagectrl_id ) VALUES ( :report_name, :period_generated, :last_pagenum, :status, :company_id, :created_by, :pagectrl_id )
SQL.RUNNING_PERIOD: select * from Elp_Reports_PageCtrl where Report_Name = :report_name and company_id = :CompanyId and status = 'Running'
SQL.REPORT_STATUS_FOR_A_PERIOD: select status from Elp_Reports_PageCtrl where Report_Name = :report_name and PERIOD_GENERATED = :ReportPeriod and company_id = :CompanyId
SQL.REPORT_ACCOUNTING_START_DATE: SELECT TO_CHAR((MAX(closing_date) + 1),'YYYYMMDD') As begin_date FROM ELITA.ELP_ACCOUNTING_CLOSE_INFO ACT, ELITA.ELP_COMPANY COMP WHERE ACT.COMPANY_ID = COMP.COMPANY_ID AND ACT.COMPANY_ID = :CompanyId AND ACT.CLOSING_DATE < :ClosingDate
SQL.REPORT_ACCOUNTING_CLOSE_DATE: SELECT TO_CHAR(MIN(closing_date), 'YYYYMMDD') As closing_date FROM ELITA.ELP_ACCOUNTING_CLOSE_INFO ACT, ELITA.ELP_COMPANY COMP WHERE ACT.COMPANY_ID = COMP.COMPANY_ID AND ACT.COMPANY_ID = :CompanyId AND ACT.CLOSING_DATE > :BeginDate
